nodes.text: The Naboo system was a solar system of the Chommell sector, in the galaxy's Mid Rim. It notably contained the pastoral planet of Naboo. In the last decades of the Galactic Republic, it was represented in the Galactic Senate by Sheev Palpatine, and then Padmé Amidala.
Rise of the Separatists lists the three moons of Naboo as Ohma-D'un, Rori, and Veruna. However, Claudia Gray's novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan featured a moon of Naboo called Onoam.
